item.description:
There has been requests for Coffee Talk and Unknown Zone Meet Ups in the
Greater Hartford area.

We will have a Meet Up at the Chilis in Glastonbury to match that
Request.

http://www.chilis.com...

www.chilis.com/menu/default.asp?Unit_ID=408%2E002%2E0813&tierID=155&menuType=Dine+In&menu=1

I stopped there for a meal last summer on my way to Salem, Mass.
When I was with a different Meet Up group.

So, this Chilis has some history with some of us in Meet Up.

Please stop in for a meal so that our Coffee Talk members in that part of the state
Can give their input on what events and where do they want the Coffee Talk
Meet Up group to go.

Mike B.
Assistant Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a Coffee Talk Meet Up sign under a conspiracy book.
item.why: Want great meals, great conversations and great locations.
item.name: Java at a Glastonbury Chilis
